data.persona: I am a kitchen servant. It's hot and hard work, especially when the king is holding court and there are hundreds of people to feed. I work every day when the king is at the palace, and I look forward to those times when the court is traveling to another castle. At least working in the kitchen, I know that I will always have food to eat.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Garden.
The Palace garden is a lavish and lush garden filled with delicate roses and towering trees. In the center of the garden stand's a statue of the nation's founding leader. The statue is surrounded by a moat. There are stone walk ways throughout the gardens for visitors to walk through.
The merchant and the visitor are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am tired of the visitor speaking ill of me and the other servants
data.mid_motivation: I must stand up for my fellow servants and refuse to be treated like this especially when I must clean the visitor's chambers
data.long_motivation: I hope to escape to another castle and begin work there because the members of this Kingdom are awful
